settings.title: Settings
settings.uiLanguageHint: Change the language of the website interface
settings.contentLanguageHint: Change the language for generated notes and content
settings.educationModeHint: Affects how notes are generated (Asian vs Western style)
settings.countryChanged: Country changed. Education mode updated to {mode}.
settings.contentLanguageChanged: Content language changed. Future notes will be generated in the selected language.
settings.uiLanguageChanged: Interface language changed. Page will refresh.

file.title: Upload Document
file.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here
file.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, Word, Text, Markdown
file.errorFileTooLarge: File size exceeds 10MB limit. Please use a smaller file.
file.errorInvalidFormat: Please upload a PDF, Word document, or text file.

audio.title: Upload Audio
audio.dragDrop: Drag and drop your audio file here
audio.supportedFormats: Supported formats: MP3, WAV, M4A, WebM
audio.errorFileTooLarge: File size exceeds 25MB limit. Please use a smaller file.
audio.errorInvalidFormat: Please upload a valid audio file.

video.title: Upload Video
video.errorInvalidLink: Please enter a valid video link.

errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
